@graph.name: How to Connect Shopify to eBay
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to integrate Shopify with eBay for multichannel selling

step.name: Install eBay Sales Channel
step.text: Go to Shopify App Store, search for eBay app, click Add app and authorize access to your Shopify account

step.name: Connect eBay Account
step.text: Log in to your eBay account and grant permissions for Shopify to manage product listings and sync inventory

step.name: Configure Business Policies
step.text: Set shipping rules, returns, and payment options in your eBay store using business policies

step.name: Import and Sync Products
step.text: Choose products to import from Shopify to eBay, enable price sync and order sync for consistency

step.name: Optimize eBay Listings
step.text: Adjust product titles and descriptions for eBay SEO best practices to improve search visibility

mainEntity.name: How does Shopify eBay integration handle international shipping and currency conversion?

acceptedAnswer.text: Most third-party apps support currency conversion and sync with eBay's Global Shipping Program for international orders.

mainEntity.name: Can I manage returns and refunds across both platforms?

acceptedAnswer.text: Returns must be handled manually on eBay, but some apps sync return details with Shopify inventory.
eBay listings don't impact Shopify store SEO, but well-optimized product descriptions can improve visibility on both platforms.

mainEntity.name: Are there product restrictions when syncing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Digital goods, services, and restricted items may not sync properly. Check eBay policies before listing.
